About Me

A few words about myself

BIO

I am a Belgian who came to live in Tijuana, Mexico. It's been interesting. I was born in 82, making me a Xennial. That means I grew up playing outside, and cell phones and the internet came around when I was already a young adult, but I adapted well. I learned English watching Hollywood movies and playing Nintendo. I'm married, and we have a dog, a rescue named Vago. I do Web Design and experiment with System Administration at home.
